text: Kripa is a Hindic given name that may refer to *Kripa Ram Barath, Rajasthani poet *Kripa Sagar (1875–1939), Punjabi poet *Kripa Shankar Patel Bishnoi (born 1977), Indian professional wrestler and coach *Kripa Shankar Sharma, Hindi poet *Kripashankar Singh, Indian politician Category:Indian masculine given names
title: Kripa (given name)
